8ca0d6ff-a282-4d23-a537-594b38bbd285.summary: Eudaimonism: Flourishing as Living in Accordance with Virtue
8ca0d6ff-a282-4d23-a537-594b38bbd285.content: {Human flourishing is achieved by living in accordance with virtue}, {Virtue is a disposition to act in ways that are morally good}, {Living in accordance with virtue leads to a fulfilling and meaningful life}

19bba69c-7d39-4ef8-94c1-6e4d363e1803.content: {Human flourishing is achieved by maximizing pleasure}, {Pleasure is the only intrinsic good}, {A life with the greatest balance of pleasure over pain is the most flourishing}

983f4847-c192-4b9c-87b0-85368bff1e51.summary: Desire Satisfaction Theory: Flourishing as Fulfilling Desires
983f4847-c192-4b9c-87b0-85368bff1e51.content: {Human flourishing is achieved by fulfilling one's desires}, {A desire is a mental state that motivates action}, {The more desires that are satisfied, the more a person flourishes}

7dce4580-84f4-4fe9-a09e-bde01330b918.summary: Objective List Theory: Flourishing as Achieving Objective Goods
7dce4580-84f4-4fe9-a09e-bde01330b918.content: {Human flourishing is achieved by attaining objective goods}, {Objective goods are valuable independently of personal desires}, {Examples of objective goods include knowledge, friendship, and achievement}

de480d05-cb22-466f-a039-fe52689f2d62.summary: What is the right definition of AGI (artificial general intelligence)?
de480d05-cb22-466f-a039-fe52689f2d62.content: What is the right definition of AGI (artificial general intelligence)?

3abacef6-0e0c-466a-a79b-9bda834f9867.content: {AGI is an artificial system that can perform any intellectual task that a human can}, {AGI must possess the ability to learn and adapt to new situations}, {AGI must be capable of understanding and generating natural language}, {AGI must be able to reason and solve problems across a wide range of domains}

87f0d479-bdac-4718-9ddb-4c0c9e7d405f.content: {AGI is an artificial system that possesses consciousness}, {AGI must have subjective experiences and self-awareness}, {AGI must be capable of understanding its own mental states}, {AGI must be able to reflect on its actions and decisions}

211ab63b-e8e4-4453-bec5-42d86efddc44.content: {AGI is an artificial system that can engage in ethical reasoning}, {AGI must be able to evaluate actions based on moral principles}, {AGI must be capable of understanding and applying ethical theories}, {AGI must be able to resolve moral dilemmas}

af9af08f-cf61-4403-887a-9213045aabd5.content: {AGI is an artificial system that can interact socially with humans}, {AGI must be able to understand social cues and norms}, {AGI must be capable of empathy and emotional intelligence}, {AGI must be able to communicate effectively in social contexts}
